message:
Version 0.20 release. Improved signing and verifying code. Add an
UnsignedTx class.
Add "bu" script. Rename to "sec_to_public_pair". Other minor changes.
Add BIP0032 warning about public keys.
Add GreenAddress to list of users.
Expand netcode to 3-letter codes, add Blackcoin, related changes

Update README.md

Add link to pycoinnet.
Add Wall of Coins to the list of users.
Add support for Python 3.5 and remove support for 3.2.
Drop support for Python version < 3.5 (except 2.7). Fix tests.
Update doc about bitcoin testnet provider

Replaced stale Travis badge with GitHub Actions

The stale (failing) badge on the README was not very reassuring on the status of this projects. That's a pity, since it seems well maintained and build correctly!
